sentences.english: X axis and Y axis adopt ball spiral rods with excellent precisions and low friction factors.
sentences.chinese: 軸採用滾珠螺桿傳動精度佳，摩擦係數小。

sentences.english: A single concrete tank required for Bio-Module shaft.
sentences.chinese: 生物模塊軸需要一個單獨的水泥池。

sentences.english: Then their centers have been offset by 25 meters along the X axis.
sentences.chinese: 那麼他們的中心是沿着X軸偏移了25米。

sentences.english: So, the Greenwich Meridian would be here, now, the one on the x axis.
sentences.chinese: 因此本初子午線應該在這裏，也就是x軸。

sentences.english: The ST420 is an analog-output shaft speed sensor.
sentences.chinese: ST420是一款模擬輸出軸轉速傳感器。

sentences.english: Each axis travels on ball screw.
sentences.chinese: 每個軸行程的滾珠絲桿。

sentences.english: A shortcut route has been provided for working out the post-process program of parallel-link machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 爲編制虛擬軸機牀數控後處理程序提供一條捷徑。

sentences.english: The results suggested that Nujin Pill could regulate the function of pituitarium-ovary axis.
sentences.chinese: 提示女金丹對垂體卵巢軸具有興奮和調整作用。

sentences.english: In some cases, it may be necessary to change the accessory stub shaft in the motor.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，可能需要改變電機配件存根軸。

sentences.english: There are many alternatives in obtaining tandem axle dump truck financing.
sentences.chinese: 有許多替代品在獲得串聯軸自卸車融資。

sentences.english: The small metal shaft will be removed, and I ll drill a hole to accept the radar shafts.
sentences.chinese: 小金屬軸將被刪除，我會鑽一個孔，接受雷達軸。

sentences.english: These crosses are longer on the vertical axis than they are on the horizontal axis.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是長在十字架縱軸比他們的水平軸。

sentences.english: The starting speed of particles in world space, along X, Y, and Z.
sentences.chinese: 粒子在世界座標系內的開始速度，沿着X，Y和Z軸。

sentences.english: A Finance Street will be established at the business core of Youyi Road.
sentences.chinese: 位於友誼路商業核心軸，規劃爲商業金融一條街。

sentences.english: The finished model was manufactured by 3-axis NC milling machine.
sentences.chinese: 最終利用3軸精雕機牀進行數控銑削編程加工。

sentences.english: That is to say, it's a wonderful axis of combination that you're looking at.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，你所看到的是一條了不起的組合軸。
